meanings.sent1: After getting distracted, she refocusses on her homework.
meanings.sent2: He refocusses his camera to capture a better angle of the sunset.
meanings.sent3: The cat refocusses its attention on the moving laser pointer.
meanings.sent4: The detective refocusses his investigation on a new suspect.
meanings.sent5: The teacher refocusses the students' attention by introducing a fun activity.

meanings.definition: To concentrate or direct attention on something again.
meanings.sent1: When the noise outside stopped, she refocusses on her book.
meanings.sent2: He refocusses on the task at hand after a brief interruption.
meanings.sent3: The child refocusses on the game after being briefly distracted by a passing bird.
meanings.sent4: The athlete refocusses on his training after a disappointing performance.
meanings.sent5: The speaker refocusses the audience's attention by sharing an interesting fact.
